pageProduct.name: Trilogy Hydrating Mist Toner 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Trilogy's certified natural Hydrating Mist Toner is a revitalising all-in-one toner and floral moisture mist that instantly delivers moisture to thirsty skin, anytime and anywhere!

From toning to make-up prep, this gentle, aromatic hydration mist with rose, geranium and lavender works to leave skin toned, cooled, hydrated and dewy.
Perfect for warmer seasons, hot humid climates, travel, post work workout cooldown and setting make-up.

Suitable for all skin types.
Key Benefits:
- Hydrates and tones
- Adds a dewy glow to skin
- Refreshes skin anytime

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Instantly revitalises, hydrates and refreshes with rose flower, geranium and lavender.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Rose Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Caprylyl/Capryl Wheat Bran/Straw Glycosides (and) Aqua (and) Fusel Wheat Bran/Straw Glycosides (and) Polyglyceryl-5 Oleate (and) Sodium Glutamate (and) Glyceryl Caprylate, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Hold at least 30cm away from the face and gently spritz over skin. Allow mist to dry naturally. Alternatively spray onto a cotton pad and wipe over skin to tone after cleansing.
